posts.post_title: PRICE REDUCED: 1899-00 M101 Sporting News Supp. HONUS WAGNER Rookie
posts.post_content:
Hello,
For sale is a 1899-00 M101 Sporting News Supp. HONUS WAGNER Rookie. This has been slabbed by Beckett with an "A" grade. I am asking $2,000 on this tough HOF Rookie. Price includes insured shipping. I wasn't able to get a good clear pic of it in the slab but here it is before being slabbed:

[IMG]http://i154.photobucket.com/albums/s280/chromerookies/HOF%20Rookies%201800s/1899M101SportingNewsSuppHonusWagner.jpg[/IMG]

Please PM me or send me an email to [url]ivforlife16@yahoo.com[/url] with any interest,
Thanks,
Dan

another reduction. Any interest out there or should I just put it away?
Dan

No, he ebayed it (I won it). I plan on holding onto it for quite a while...
